description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying each roster file processing record
Unique Roster Object identifier representing a specific roster file/job execution
Foreign key linking to Risk Adjustment file metadata (file name
Foreign key linking to roster configuration and roster-level details
Foreign key linking to provider/professional master data used during processing
Source system from which the roster data was received (e.g.
Name of the healthcare provider organization whose roster was processed
US state in which the provider organization operates
Line of Business for the data (e.g.
Processing iteration number (1 = initial run
Total number of records received in the roster file
Number of records successfully processed
Number of records that failed processing
Number of records skipped due to business rules or duplication
Number of records rejected due to validation or compliance errors
Percentage of successfully processed records for the file
Overall processing health indicator derived from success percentage (e.g.
Flag indicating whether the record is currently active
Timestamp when the processing record was created
User or system that created the processing record
Timestamp when the record was last updated
User or system that last updated the record
